headline: When Inclusivity Is Code for Intolerance
author: Mario Loyola
sentences:
As Tikvahs chairman and executive director Elliott Abrams and Eric Cohen write in the Wall Street Journal, museum staff said that DeSantis doesnt align with the museums values and its message of inclusivity.?
The governors planned speech, The Florida Model and Why Its Good for Jews,? could hardly be characterized as ...

After months of planning, New York Citys Museum of Jewish Heritage was just weeks away from hosting the Tikvah Funds Jewish Leadership Conference when it learned that Florida governor Ron DeSantis was among the speakers.
It immediately told the conference organizers that Governor DeSantis would not be allowed to speak.
The Museum of Jewish Heritage sacrifices its reputation on the altar of wokeness.
